title: Create a New Training Course in LMS
description: The L&D team is launching a new 'Project Management' workshop and needs to add it to the LMS.

tasks.description: Gather the course details: title, description, learning objectives, instructor, schedule.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist collects all necessary information for the new course.

tasks.description: Create a new course and session in the LMS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist successfully builds the new course shell in the system.

tasks.description: Publish the course to the LMS catalog so that employees can enroll.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist makes the course visible and available for enrollment.
